message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG 

This paper discusses the challenges and opportunities in speech-based human-robot interaction, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The paper also mentions the need for artificial intelligence (cs.AI) to bridge the gap between formulaic speech and human-human conversation. Additionally, the paper discusses the importance of understanding the pragmatics of language usage, which is relevant to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and machine learning (cs.LG).
